page.title: 18Theatre in Knypersley.
page.content: Theatre productions in Knypersley are mainly centered upon the High School.In recent years the pupils have presented productions ofThe Mikado,Fiddler on the Roof and South Pacific,which was the most recent.South Pacific ran for six consecutive nights, with an audience of approximately two hundred per night.The tickets were not sold to the general public despite a great demand.The lead of Nellie Forbush was played by pupil Helen Clarke who,as a result,wishes to persue a career in drama.The male lead was played by language teacher Roger Blenkinsop.The director was English teacher Eileen Elkin. Park Middle School has also presented such productions as The Wizard of Oz.These do not receive the same amount of support commanded by High School Productions.
